category.name: Integration.Configuring CAE
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CAE_file_download_default_conflict_resolution_option
preference.preference_description: Defines the options available when there is a name conflict while downloading a file from a dataset. The system provides an interactive dialog while the other options are automatically applied. Valid Values: Overwrite: This option will overwrite the file on the desktop with the file in Teamcenter. Rename and Download: This option will rename the file being downloaded from Teamcenter and the download that file. Skip: This option will skip downloading the file from Teamcenter.
